NOVO Energy R&D AB - https://www.novoenergy.se/ - Sr. Software Engineer - On-site, Gothenburg, Sweden - Full Time

We are a small team building a data platform for our R&D organization with a stated goal of democratizing internal access to data to enable good research. We are looking for an additional generalist who enjoys solving interesting problems across a wide area of domains:

  • machine-to-machine communication using various low-level or industrial protocols

  • hybrid-cloud setup

  • data engineering

  • back-office front-end applications

Tech: Rust, ClickHouse, PostgreSQL
